verses.roman:
eta śuni' raghunātha vandilā caraṇa
mahāprabhu kailā tāṅre kṛpā-āliṅgana

synonyms: eta śuni'-hearing this; raghunātha—Raghu nātha dāsa; vandilā caraṇa—offered prayers to the lotus feet; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā—did; tāṅre—him; kṛpā-āliṅgana—embracing out of mercy.
translation: Having heard this, Raghunātha dāsa offered prayers at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and the Lord, with great mercy, embraced him.
